paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene along with penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 45‐year‐old woman with breast cancer was found to have BRCA2 p.Lys322Gln with C‐score of 16.89.
Her sister with breast cancer was referred to genetic counseling and testing showed her not to have the same variant.

functional_data.summary: The variant p.Lys322Gln was identified in 6 patients with breast cancer.

variants.segregation_data: The segregation study suggested this mutation was not pathogenic.
variants.additional_notes: The variant p.Lys322Gln was seen in 6 patients, but one patient had another BRCA2 deleterious mutation.
key_quotes: A 45‐year‐old woman with breast cancer was found to have BRCA2 p.Lys322Gln with C‐score of 16.89.
Her sister with breast cancer was referred to genetic counseling and testing showed her not to have the same variant.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
